statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions
SELECT country, carbon_emissions_reduction FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY country DESC
SELECT DISTINCT country, renewable_energy_source FROM carbon_emissions
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE carbon_emissions_reduction > 0.5
SELECT country, renewable_energy_source, carbon_emissions_reduction FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY carbon_emissions_reduction ASC
SELECT country, renewable_energy_source, carbon_emissions_reduction FROM carbon_emissions WHERE carbon_emissions_reduction > 0.5 ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT country, carbon_emissions_reduction, renewable_energy_source FROM carbon_emissions WHERE country LIKE 'U%' ORDER BY carbon_emissions_reduction DESC
SELECT renewable_energy_source, AVG(carbon_emissions_reduction) AS avg_reduction FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY renewable_energy_source HAVING avg_reduction > 0.3
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE renewable_energy_source IN ('Solar', 'Wind')
SELECT country, SUM(carbon_emissions_reduction) AS total_reduction FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY country HAVING total_reduction > 50 ORDER BY total_reduction DESC
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, emission_reduction FROM emissions WHERE renewable_source = 'Solar';
SELECT id, source_name, capacity FROM sources ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, date, emission_reduction FROM emissions WHERE emission_reduction > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM sources WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable' AND capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, source_name, source_type, capacity FROM sources JOIN emissions ON sources.source_name = emissions.renewable_source WHERE emissions.date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT company_name, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY source_type DESC;
SELECT company_name, emission_amount, emission_date FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY emission_date ASC;

SELECT c.company_name, r.source_name, er.reduction_amount FROM carbon_emissions c INNER JOIN emission_reduction er ON c.emission_id = er.emission_id INNER JOIN renewable_energy_sources r ON r.source_id = er.source_id;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT company_name, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_emissions > 500;

SELECT ce.company_name, res.source_name, er.reduction_amount FROM carbon_emissions ce JOIN emission_reduction er ON ce.emission_id = er.emission_id JOIN renewable_energy_sources res ON er.source_id = res.source_id;

SELECT DISTINCT ce.company_name, res.source_type FROM carbon_emissions ce JOIN emission_reduction er ON ce.emission_id = er.emission_id JOIN renewable_energy_sources res ON er.source_id = res.source_id ORDER BY ce.company_name;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emission_tracking;
SELECT company_name, energy_source FROM carbon_emission_tracking WHERE emission_reduction_percentage > 10;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction_projects WHERE total_reduction > 5000 AND start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry, country FROM companies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM carbon_emission_tracking WHERE energy_source = 'solar' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, emission_reduction_percentage FROM carbon_emission_tracking WHERE emission_reduction_percentage > 50;
SELECT company_name, energy_source, emission_reduction_percentage FROM carbon_emission_tracking WHERE emission_reduction_percentage <= 30 ORDER BY emission_reduction_percentage DESC;
SELECT company_name, energy_source, emission_reduction_percentage FROM carbon_emission_tracking WHERE energy_source = 'wind' AND emission_reduction_percentage >= 40;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity_kW BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT id, source_name FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, country FROM companies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT company_name, emission_value FROM companies INNER JOIN emissions ON companies.id = emissions.company_id WHERE emission_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT company_name, country FROM companies ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT company_name, emission_value FROM companies JOIN emissions ON companies.id = emissions.company_id;
SELECT source_name, carbon_reduction FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE carbon_reduction > 0.5;
